com.foreach.across.core.context.module

Class AcrossModuleDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.module.AcrossModuleDescriptor

  • public class AcrossModuleDescriptor
extends Object
    Represents the original descriptor of an Across module, as defined by an AcrossModule implementation. A module extension will always have its own separate descriptor.

    If you are looking for the modifiable configuration of a module, see AcrossModuleConfiguration instead.

    Two descriptors are considered equal if they have the same module name.

    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    AcrossModuleConfiguration
